verses.name: 2 Chronicles 10:5
verses.text: And he said unto them, Come again unto me after three days. And the people departed.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 10:6
verses.text: And king Rehoboam took counsel with the old men that had stood before Solomon his father while he yet lived, saying, What counsel give ye me to return answer to this people?

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 10:7
verses.text: And they spake unto him, saying, If thou be kind to this people, and please them, and speak good words to them, they will be thy servants for ever.
